value:
$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|What's the nearby situation like?$k$p$WmMPID_ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Normal,Face|An entire town has been destroyed...
It's like that earthquake swallowed it
whole.$k$p$WmMPID_セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Normal,Face|A large-scale force is approaching
from the south, but I can't discern its
affiliation.$k$pThey're wearing armor I've never
seen before.$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|Ike, look at those clouds... They don't
look natural to me. What's
happening?$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|I don't know, Mist...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Well met, Greil Mercenaries.$k$p$WmMPID_セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Normal,Face|And you are?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I'm Marth, a swordsman from another
land. And I'd like to ask your group for
help.$k$p$WmMPID_ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Normal,Face|So you have a job for us? Normally
we would be glad for the work, but at
the moment...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The chaos before you is caused by
the Tempest. I'm fighting to stem its
flow. Fight by my side...$k$pAnd your reward will be this world's
safety.$k$p$WmMPID_セネリオ,ch09_02_Senerio_M_Normal,Face|You show up out of nowhere and
claim you're trying to save the world?
Sounds shady to me.$k$pWhy exactly should we put our trust in
you, Marth from another land?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Because our enemy within the
Tempest is the Black Knight... The
very same Ike's father once fought.$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|Yeah, we know him...$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|What are we going to do, Ike?$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|...Let's hear what he has to say.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest's chaos has been
stemmed.$k$pVictory is yours.$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|Ike, I'm so glad! We were finally able
to—$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|Mist...$k$p$WmMPID_ミスト,ch09_03_Mist_F_Normal,Face|What? This means we got revenge
for Dad, right?$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|No... That wasn't the Black Knight.$k$pHe looked the same, and he had the
same power... But...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|But he was not the same Black Knight
you know. This one was born from the
chaos of the Tempest.$k$pI'm sorry for deceiving you... I led you
to believe it was him because I
needed your help.$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|It's fine... We did manage to fix the
world, after all.$k$pWe'll face him in battle for real one
day, and we'll settle things then.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Ike of the Greil Mercenaries... You
will face him, and you will emerge
victorious. I'm sure of it.$k$pAs much as I would like to help you in
turn, my job in this world is done. I
must be on my way.$k$p$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|Something tells me this won't be the
last time I see you.$k$pWe'll meet again someday, and I
hope you'll help us out then.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I will. You have my word. Until we
meet again, Radiant Hero.$k$p
